title: Enhancing CS Practical Skills: Blended Learning-Based Language Proficiency Development for Corporate Managers

context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Acquire and utilize over 500 job-related vocabulary items within six months through online/offline activities to enhance business document writing skills

By the end of the six-month course, learners will perform work-related scenarios at least three times in real-time online meetings (Zoom, Teams, etc.) and five times in offline role-plays, achieving over 80% attainment in at least four of five items on the communication clarity rubric (pronunciation, logical coherence, listening attitude).
Verify comprehensive language proficiency through weekly online quizzes (20%) + monthly offline presentation assessments (30%) + final project (50%)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
